title: WTS: lot of t206 SGC 10, 20 and/or 30 cards
author: trobba

posts.post_title: WTS: lot of t206 SGC 10, 20 and/or 30 cards
posts.post_content:
Anyone looking for a group of SGC cards in lower grades?

Can sell a group, anywhere from 10-30 or more, of SGC cards. I am thinking for standard commons per card pricing:

SGC
10: $22
20: $26
30: $32

Tougher commons, HOFers, SL etc will vary on prices. If you have an interest within these parameters, shoot me an email (no PMs) with either a want list or I can send a list of what I have.

I may be out a bit today (Tuesday) so will respond this afternoon/evening.

Thanks - Rob
[url]rgutheil@gmail.com[/url]

posts.post_title: T206 or Not T206...that is the question
posts.post_content:
I'm assuming this post is meant for the newly minted T206 only BST section?

Brian
sorry, I edited/clarified the title to better identify the cards. Is there a t206 only b/s/t? not really sure what you are saying...

Sorry, just a reference in jest to a recent topic on the board about the possibility of a T206 only BST section.  Good luck with selling your cards.

Brian

I believe I have gotten back to everyone with lists of the cards, please email me again if you have not heard back from me...thanks - Rob

[url]rgutheil@gmail.com[/url]

an update on sales:

all SGC 10 cards that are not "premium" cards, have been sold...assorted SGC 20/30 as well but many remain.
